title: The recurrent nevus phenomenon.
label: Figure 1
caption:
Right lower quadrant of the abdomen: irregular hyperchromic patch with
erythematous halo, measuring about 1cm.

title: The recurrent nevus phenomenon.
label: Figure 2
caption:
Dermoscopy: predominance of a blackish homogeneous pattern with

label: Figure 3
caption:
Histopathological examination of excisional biopsy (Hematoxylin &

title: The recurrent nevus phenomenon.
label: Figure 4
caption:

title: The recurrent nevus phenomenon.
label: Figure 5
caption:
Junctional nests of mature nevus cells and some isolated nevus cells
